draw.overall_supervision_plan: OIC and RSO will orient soldiers to the range and conduct a safety brief. Soldiers will coach/safety each other on the firing line with NCO's safetying in a 1:1 ratio. Newly Identified risks will be recorded and mitigated accordingly and risk acceptance will be improved at the appropriate level. Every Soldier will be considered a safety, if they see an unsafe act they will call a cease fire and notify everyone to stop training. This is a living document. OIC and RSO will continuously monitor all aspects M240 Qual.  Newly identified risks will be recorded and mitigated accordingly and risk acceptance will be approved at the appropriate level.
